entry.title: PyData Harare
entry.summary: Django Indaba will be the first serious gathering of Djangonauts in Zimbabwe. We will be meeting for talk, workshops, and fun all for the love of python s most loved web framework.
entry.content: Django Indaba will be the first serious gathering of Djangonauts in Zimbabwe. We will be meeting for talk, workshops, and fun all for the love of python s most loved web framework.
